title: Effects of polystyrene nanoplastics on apoptosis, digestive enzymes, and intestinal histological structure and flora of swamp eel (Monopterus albus)
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1085-1096
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00636K, Paper
Zihan Zhou, Wenzong Zhou, Guoxing Liu, Chenxi Zhu, Mingming Han, Tian Zhu, Qichen Jiang, Weiwei Lv
After the swamp eel (Monopterus albus) was exposed to NPs, it showed inflammation in the liver and intestine, significant changes to genes in the liver, and an increase in the abundance of pathogenic bacterial populations in the intestine.
